pullrequest.title: added base_footprint, tighter amcl config, and better rviz config

content.raw:
Thanks ! much better rotation on the spot! I faced the issue of the robot getting stuck for no reasons a few times, something to investigate later on.

I didn't succeed to solve the task as the actors are now following me VERY closely but it shouldn't be related to these changes ![Screenshot from 2018-02-23 19-32-52.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/gkR8znK/images/785930060-Screenshot_from_2018-02-23_19-32-52.png)
